name: Slim the New Imgur Homepage
description: Takes the horrible, oversized appearance of the new imgur homepage and slims it back down to something reasonable.
additional_info: September 13, 2017 - Updated to also apply to the https version of the homepage. Probably won't be updated often, if at all. I'll attempt to fix any breakage which may happen due to future changes, but I don't visit imgur often enough to warrant checking regularly.
